name: Adexin LLC
overview: Adexin is a leading software development company providing software development services & solutions. We deliver enterprise solutions to leading businesses across all industries. From insight and analysis to design and implementation, we offer services to solve your business challenges: Enterprise Applications, Mobile Applications, Software Testing, Branding, Maintenance. Working together you get fast, scalable, and cost reasonable software solutions for your business leveraging a globally distributed development model using open source technologies to reduce application lifecycle costs and improve overall productivity.
